sentences.english: The clinker discharged from grate cooler will be transported by chain conveyor to the top of clinker silo.
sentences.chinese: 从篦冷机卸出的熟料，链斗机送往熟料库顶。

sentences.english: Fuel should be spread evenly over the grate surface.
sentences.chinese: 应将燃料均匀地播撒在炉篦表面。

sentences.english: The main failure forms of grate bars used in sintering machines are ablation and fracture.
sentences.chinese: 烧结机炉篦条的主要失效形式是烧蚀和折断。

sentences.english: The structure form of labyrinth gas seals with damping sleeve is introduced firstly.
sentences.chinese: 本章首先介绍了带阻尼套筒的篦齿封严结构的形式。

sentences.english: Disclosed is a grate cooler drive shaft device.
Disclosed is a guiding mechanism of a grate cooler movable grate bed.
sentences.chinese: 篦冷机活动篦床的导向装置。

sentences.english: Therein is fruit and date-palms, producing spathes (enclosing dates);
sentences.chinese: 大地上有水果，和有花篦的海枣。

definition: pot-scrubbing brush, made from bamboo strips
thin bamboo strips used for basket weaving
(dialect) pot-scrubbing brush, made from bamboo strips
pot-scrubbing brush made of bamboo strips/basket (container) for chopsticks/variant of 筲[shao1]
comb/to comb/to weed out/to eliminate/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
to scrape the meat from bones/to pick (teeth etc)/to weed out
